resources.string:
Bio Juan. 

I like programming.An of course I like Software Developing. 

I usually go to Gym and I train very hard. 

In the summer I go to the beach. 
When I had become a expert programmer, I will be a freelance. 
I enjoy the food, any food. 
I like very much marxist philosophy and materialist philosophy in general. 

My football teams are: Liverpool, River Plate, Real Madrid, Borussia Dortmund, Olympique Marseille, Amsterdam Ajax, Napoli, Juventus, etc. 

I play music very often like Doobie Brothers, Chuck Berry, The Beatles, Creedence Clearwater Revival, etc. 


I have a grey long hair. 

And I've green color eyes. 


I like a simple pizza. 

I'm waiting to start the labour practices.
